TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program: Beta Than Ever is Now Available

<p><em>Kerbal Space Program</em>, the award-winning, indie space agency sim game from <strong>Squad</strong>, released its latest update, <em>Beta Than Ever</em> and it’s available to download today through the <a href="http://bit.ly/1jQTSlj"><strong>KSP Store</strong></a>, <a href="http://bit.ly/IYWzWg"><strong>Steam</strong></a> and other participating online retailers.
